test.name: Verify booking form with all input field

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing FOR loop.

kw.name: Unselect Frame
kw.doc: Sets the main frame as the current frame.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
